DOC.brief_summary: Recently EPO receptor find human muscle tissue , still know physiological role receptor . In study researcher want investigate effect acute administration EPO insulin resistance and/or substrate metabolism muscle tissue .
DOC.brief_title: Insulin Resistance Substrate Metabolism After Acute Erythropoietin ( EPO ) Administration
DOC.detailed_description: Recently EPO receptor find human muscle tissue , still know physiological role receptor . It previously show Growth Hormone mediate insulin resistance . The GH receptor EPO receptor belong family cytokine receptor , thereby share many signal pathway . In study want investigate similar effect insulin resistance and/or substrate metabolism acute administration EPO human muscle tissue . Different signal pathway investigate p√• western blotting , insulin sensitivity measure hyperinsulinemic euglycemic clamp , substrate metabolism measure forearm model .
DOC.criteria: Healthy person Between 18 30 year Normal weight ( BMI : 1825 ) Severe heart disease ( NYHA 3 ) Uncontrolled hypertension Previous cerebrovascular disease Proliferative retinopathy Diabetes Musculoskeletal disease
